item.title: Destination Marketing Tips and Tricks from tourism experts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Learn More About Tourism Marketing. We Bring You Destination Marketing Tips and Tricks

Tourism is one of the largest and fastest growing industries in the world, which is why sustainable tourism is so important. It helps to conserve cultural heritage and preserve nature in the same time. Every destination has it’s own unique story and practicing sustainable tourism, you give that unique story much more important place in marketing, destination planning and assessment and of course you have long term benefits. As the number of tourists rises each year, it is of vital importance to have appropriate management and marketing tools for sustainable tourism. This is where ConsultingPress can help you. Feel free to contact our consultants today to learn more about sustainable tourism and it’s impact on cultural heritage and local economy.

item.title: The great value of sustainable tourism development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Importance of Sustainable Tourism Development in Preserving Cultural Heritage and Nature
Why is sustainable tourism so important? It helps preserve cultural heritage and nature. By practicing a sustainable tourism as a company, tourist agency and any other for of tourism entity you help to make only positive impact on environment and society, while in the same time you have many economical advantages.
Tourism is one of the largest and fastest growing industries in the world, which is why sustainable tourism is so important. It helps to conserve cultural heritage and preserve nature in the same time. Every destination has it’s own unique story and practicing sustainable tourism, you give that unique story much more important place in marketing, destination planning and assessment and of course you have long term benefits.
Preserving cultural heritage is very important. By cultural heritage we mean all kinds of human creations across the globe. It means all aspects of human history. By marketing your cultural heritage in appropriate way, you are inviting tourists, that is visitors to visit and explore your destination and society. It gives personal experience and leaves long term impact on both the visitor and local economy.
As the number of tourists rises each year, it is of vital importance to have appropriate management and marketing tools for sustainable tourism. This is where ConsultingPress can help you. Feel free to contact our consultants today to learn more about sustainable tourism and it’s impact on cultural heritage and local economy.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: How to Improve Your Tourism Marketing Strategies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Effective Marketing - Learn How to Improve Your Tourism Marketing Strategies

Tourism marketing is very important. Natural, effective marketing is very important in any business, so is tourism. One way of improving your tourism marketing strategies is to highlight that your business is based on sustainable tourism. Tourism is one of the largest and fastest growing industries in the world, which is why sustainable tourism is so important. It helps to conserve cultural heritage and preserve nature in the same time. Every destination has it’s own unique story and practicing sustainable tourism, you give that unique story much more important place in marketing, destination planning and assessment and of course you have long term benefits. As the number of tourists rises each year, it is of vital importance to have appropriate management and marketing tools for sustainable tourism. This is where ConsultingPress can help you. Feel free to contact our consultants today to learn more about sustainable tourism and it’s impact on cultural heritage and local economy.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Workforce Development for Kai Resort Thailand
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider nivo_style="nivo-slider-01" slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221845%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221842%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221848%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EKai%20Resort%20Thailand%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EStrategic%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Human resources are always the most important part of any business. The same is with tourism. Every tourism business needs skilled, professional tourism experts on all tourism service levels. We started to work on this project in May 2016 and finished it in August.
The service ConsultingPress provided was workforce analysis, where we analysed workforce available, their skills and knowledge as the need for additional education and training.
ConsultingPress connected Kai Resort with educational center to provide high quality tourism training and education on all levels.
By the end of the project, Kai Resort increased number of visitors by 35%.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Connecting%20to%20educational%20centers%20to%20provide%20high%20quality%20tourism%20training%20and%20education%20on%20all%20levels.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Tourism%20Management%20Training%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20tourism%20strategy%20for%20increasing%20number%20of%20visitors%20and%20quality%20of%20service%20they%20receive%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20marketing%20and%20branding%20strategy%20creation%20and%20implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increase%20in%20number%20of%20daily%20visitors%20by%2035%25%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20sustainable%20tourism%20strategy%20implementation%20lead%20to%20greater%20awareness%20of%20local%20cultural%20heritage%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Enhanced%20the%20skills%20of%20tourism%20service%20staff%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Built%20greater%20awareness%20of%20Kai%20Resort%20as%20tourism%20destination%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Destination Management Plan for Scuba Diving Philippines
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider nivo_style="nivo-slider-01" slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221852%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221855%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221858%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EScuba%20Diving%20Philippines%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EScuba%20Travel%2C%20Philippines%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ETourism%20development%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Destination management plays the vital role in tourism development. It connects all tourism destination aspects like culture, natural environment, attractions and enables successful management. We started to work on this project in May 2016 and finished it in August.
The service ConsultingPress provided was complete tourism development, with main goal of creating destination management plan for Scuba Diving Philippines. ConsultingPress expert consultants made detailed study, suggested needed strategic and marketing improvements that will lead to more visitors. By using our tourism consultant tools and services, the projection of increase of number of visitors climbed to 40% in three months. That’s quite impressive result.
Destination management services ConsultingPress provided included definition of clear vision for destination, custom business plan that resulted with positive economical and environmental impacts.
By the end of the project, Scuba Diving Philippines increased number of daily visitors by 57%.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading item.title: Complete Branding & Marketing for Galeo Tours, Mallorca
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider nivo_style="nivo-slider-01" slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221862%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221865%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EGaleo%20Tours%2C%20Mallorca%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EGaleo%20Travel%2C%20Spain%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ETourism%20Marketing%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Galeo Tours, Mallorca is a small family business, travel agency from Mallorca. Our job was to create memorable brand identity and marketing strategy for this tourism agency. We started to work on this project in May 2016 and finished it in August.
The service ConsultingPress provided was complete marketing and branding, with main goal of creating memorable and recognisable brand for this travel agency. ConsultingPress expert consultants made detailed study, suggested needed strategic and marketing improvements that will lead to more visitors. By using our tourism consultant tools and services, the projection of increase of number of visitors climbed to 40% in three months. That’s quite impressive result.
Branding services included complete brand identity creation and web design and development. Marketing activities helped in creating powerful, recognisable brand across Mallorca and social media networks.
By the end of the project, Galeo Tours increased number of new clients by 35%.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Connecting%20to%20local%20residents%20and%20travel%20agencies%20to%20enhance%20travelers%20experience%20and%20provide%20them%20with%20important%20information%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Branding%20and%20marketing%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20destination%20assessment%20and%20new%20tourism%20strategy%20for%20increasing%20number%20of%20visitors%20and%20quality%20of%20service%20they%20receive%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%5CnNew%20marketing%20and%20branding%20strategy%20creation%20and%20implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading item.title: Destination Management Plan for Bernina Railway, Switzerland
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider nivo_style="nivo-slider-01" slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221869%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221872%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EBernina%20Railway%2C%20Switzerland%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESwissSole%20Travel%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ETourism%20development%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Bernina Railway, Switzerland is one of the most famous railways in Europe. It offers amazing view to Swiss Alps to it's traveler. We started to work on Bernina Railway, Switzerland Tourism Development project in May 2016 and finished it in August.
The service ConsultingPress provided was complete strategic planning, with main goal of creating destination management plan for Bernina Railway, Switzerland. ConsultingPress expert consultants made detailed study, suggested needed strategic and marketing improvements that will lead to more visitors. By using our tourism consultant tools and services, the projection of increase of number of visitors climbed to 40% in three months. That’s quite impressive result.
Tourism development services ConsultingPress provided included complete destination assessment, creation of tourism master plan, new marketing strategies and new visitors attractions planning.
By the end of the project, Bernina Railway, Switzerland increased number of traveler by 35%.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" item.title: Implementation of Visitor Information Services, Phuket
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider nivo_style="nivo-slider-01" slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221889%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221892%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EVisitor%20Information%20Center%20Phuket%2C%20Thailand%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ETraining%20and%20Education%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Providing travelers with right information and providing high quality of service is of vital importance for every tourism destination. In scope of this project we developed a plan for developing Tourist Information Center in Phuket, Thailand. We started to work on this project in May 2016 and finished it in August.
The service ConsultingPress provided was complete tourist information center development, with main goal of educating and developing high quality tourism workers that will be at service to traveler. ConsultingPress expert consultants made detailed study, suggested needed strategic and marketing improvements that will lead to more visitors. By using our tourism consultant tools and services, the projection of increase of number of visitors climbed to 40% in three months. That’s quite impressive result.
ConsultingPress provided high quality tourism marketing education in terms of workshops and seminars, including workshops for enhancing communication skills, that are of vital importance for every tourism business employee.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Connecting%20to%20local%20residents%20and%20travel%20agencies%20to%20enhance%20travelers%20experience%20and%20provide%20them%20with%20important%20information%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Implementation%20of%20Visitor%20Information%20Center%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20destination%20assessment%20and%20new%20tourism%20strategy%20for%20increasing%20number%20of%20visitors%20and%20quality%20of%20service%20they%20receive%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20marketing%20and%20branding%20strategy%20creation%20and%20implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increase%20in%20number%20of%20daily%20visitors%20by%2035%25%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20visitors%20information%20center%20lead%20to%20greater%20awareness%20of%20local%20cultural%20heritage%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Enhanced%20the%20skills%20of%20tourism%20service%20staff%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Tourism Marketing Strategy for Machu Picchu, Peru
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="1896"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMachu%20Picchu%20Travelers%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EStrategic%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Machu Picchu is one of the most popular travel destinations in the world. The goal of this strategic planning project was to increase the awareness of nearby villages that surrounds Macchu Picchu and increasing their tourism potential. We started to work on this project in May 2016 and finished it in August.
The service ConsultingPress provided was complete strategic planning. Our expert consultants made detailed study, suggested needed strategic and marketing improvements that will lead to more visitors. By using our tourism consultant tools and services, the projection of increase of number of visitors climbed to 40% in three months. That’s quite impressive result.
Strategic tourism planning services ConsultingPress provided included complete destination assessment, creation of tourism master plan, new marketing strategies and new visitors attractions planning.
By the end of the project, local villages surrounding Machu Picchu increased number of daily stays by 35%.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Connecting%20to%20local%20residents%20and%20travel%20agencies%20to%20enhance%20travelers%20experience%20and%20provide%20them%20with%20important%20information%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Creating%20detailed%20feasibility%20study%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20destination%20assessment%20and%20new%20tourism%20strategy%20for%20increasing%20number%20of%20visitors%20and%20quality%20of%20service%20they%20receive%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20marketing%20and%20branding%20strategy%20creation%20and%20implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list item.title: Tourism plan, development and marketing for Island of Mauritius
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider nivo_style="nivo-slider-01" slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221900%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221903%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221906%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ETourism%20Association%20Island%20of%20Mauritius%2C%20Mauritius%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EAstraqualia%20Travel%2C%20Mauritius%20Travelers%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ETourism%20Marketing%2C%20Tourism%20Development%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Creating a tourism master plan, tourism development and finally tourism marketing plan for Island of Mauritius was quite a large project. We started to work on this project in May 2016 and finished it in August.
The service ConsultingPress provided was complete tourism development and marketing services , with main goal of creating successful tourism development and tourism marketing plan for this Island of Mauritius. ConsultingPress expert consultants made detailed study, suggested needed strategic and marketing improvements that will lead to more visitors. By using our tourism consultant tools and services, the projection of increase of number of visitors climbed to 40% in three months. That’s quite impressive result.
Strategic tourism planning services ConsultingPress provided included complete destination assessment, creation of tourism master plan, new marketing strategies and new visitors attractions planning.
By the end of the project, Island of Mauritius increased number of visitors by 35%.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Connecting%20to%20local%20residents%20and%20travel%20agencies%20to%20enhance%20travelers%20experience%20and%20provide%20them%20with%20important%20information%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Creating%20detailed%20tourism%20development%20and%20tourism%20marketing%20plan%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20destination%20assessment%20and%20new%20tourism%20strategy%20for%20increasing%20number%20of%20visitors%20and%20quality%20of%20service%20they%20receive%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20marketing%20and%20branding%20strategy%20creation%20and%20implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increase%20in%20number%20of%20daily%20visitors%20by%2073%25%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20sustainable%20tourism%20strategy%20implementation%20lead%20to%20greater%20awareness%20of%20local%20cultural%20heritage%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Enhanced%20the%20skills%20of%20tourism%20service%20staff%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Built%20greater%20awareness%20of%20Island%20of%20Mauritius%20as%20tourism%20destination%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Tourism Master Plan for Wine Tourism, Sicilia, Italy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider nivo_style="nivo-slider-01" slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221913%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221916%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221919%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESicilia%20White%20Wine%20Association%2C%20Italy%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESicilia%20Travel%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ETourism%20development%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Italian wines are well known in the world. The aim of this project was to create tourism development plan for small wine business in Sicilia Italy by connecting them in wine association. That will help in creating more powerful brand and raise awareness of great Sicilian white wines. We started to work on this project in May 2016 and finished it in August.
The service ConsultingPress provided was complete tourism development, with main goal of creating tourism development plan. ConsultingPress expert consultants made detailed study, suggested needed strategic and marketing improvements that will lead to more visitors and wine buyers. By using our tourism consultant tools and services, the projection of increase of number of visitors climbed to 40% in three months and increase of wine bottles sales by 45%. That’s quite impressive result.
Tourism development services ConsultingPress provided included complete destination assessment, creation of tourism master plan, sales plan creation, new product marketing strategies and new visitors attractions planning.
By the end of the project, Sicilia White Wine Association increased it's sales by 65%.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Connecting%20to%20local%20residents%20and%20travel%20agencies%20to%20enhance%20travelers%20experience%20and%20provide%20them%20with%20important%20information%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Creating%20detailed%20tourism%20development%20plan%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20destination%20assessment%20and%20new%20tourism%20strategy%20for%20increasing%20number%20of%20visitors%20and%20quality%20of%20service%20they%20receive%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20marketing%20and%20branding%20strategy%20creation%20and%20implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increase%20in%20number%20of%20daily%20visitors%20by%2055%25%20and%20sales%20by%2065%25%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22New%20sustainable%20tourism%20strategy%20implementation%20lead%20to%20greater%20awareness%20of%20local%20cultural%20heritage%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Enhanced%20the%20skills%20of%20tourism%20service%20staff%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Built%20greater%20awareness%20of%20Sicilia%20as%20tourism%20destination%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Tourism Development Plan for Spa Resort, Swiss Alps
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider nivo_style="nivo-slider-01" slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221923%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221926%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221929%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESpa%20Resort%20Swiss%20Alps%2C%20Switzerland%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESwissSole%20Travel%2C%20Swiss%20Alps%20Travel%20Group%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ETourism%20development%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Spa Resort Swiss Alps is a part of hotel chain in Swiss Alps. It is situated at 2000 meters above the sea level. It's infinite pool which is on the last floor gives amazing view on surrounding mountains. We started to work on this project in May 2016 and finished it in August.
The service ConsultingPress provided was complete strategic planning, with main goal of creating tourism development plan for this Spa Resort. ConsultingPress expert consultants made detailed study, suggested needed strategic and marketing improvements that will lead to more visitors. By using our tourism consultant tools and services, the projection of increase of number of visitors climbed to 40% in three months. That’s quite impressive result.
Tourism development services ConsultingPress provided included complete destination assessment, creation of tourism master plan, new marketing strategies and new visitors attractions planning.
By the end of the project, Spa Resort Swiss Alps increased number of visitors by 35%.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list item.title: Feasibility Study for Aqua Park in Istria, Croatia
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483522681405{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_nivo_slider nivo_style="nivo-slider-01" slide_group="%5B%7B%22image%22%3A%221933%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221936%22%7D%2C%7B%22image%22%3A%221942%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483522688298{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESolis%20Aqua%20Park%2C%20Istria%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EAstraqualia%20Travel%2C%20Istra%20Travelers%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EStrategic%20Planning%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483522695427{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Have you heard about new aqua park called Solis in Istria, Croatia? You should because it’s really great. It has ten outdoor pools with waterslides, amazing cocktail bars and pool bars and large number of attractions for children. We started to work on this project in May 2016 and finished it in August.
The service ConsultingPress provided was complete strategic planning, with main goal of creating feasibility study for this Aquapark. ConsultingPress expert consultants made detailed study, suggested needed strategic and marketing improvements that will lead to more visitors. By using our tourism consultant tools and services, the projection of increase of number of visitors climbed to 40% in three months. That’s quite impressive result.
Strategic tourism planning services ConsultingPress provided included complete destination assessment, creation of tourism master plan, new marketing strategies and new visitors attractions planning.
By the end of the project, Solis increased number of visitors by 35%.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1483522703396{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list
